Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Hotel Niel places you in the heart of Paris, minutes from Place Charles de Gaulle Etoile and Arc de Triomphe. This hotel is close to Eiffel Tower and Louvre Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 35 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have separate bathtubs and showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and blackout drapes/curtains.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a fireplace in the lobby.

Dining
Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. A shuttle from the hotel to the airport is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11:30 AM
Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

A stay at Hotel Niel places you in the heart of Paris, minutes from Place Charles de Gaulle Etoile and Arc de Triomphe. This hotel is close to Eiffel Tower and Louvre Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Place Charles de Gaulle Etoile - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Arc de Triomphe - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Lido - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Parc Monceau - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Espace Champerret - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Palais des Congres de Paris - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Jacquemart-Andre Museum - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Musee Nissim de Camondo - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Bois de Boulogne - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Baccarat Museum - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Guimet Museum - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Paris Museum of Modern Art - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Square des Batignolles - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Palais de la Decouverte - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Theatre Marigny - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi

The nearest airports are:
Paris (ORY-Orly) - 17.2 km / 10.7 mi
Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle) - 24.4 km / 15.1 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Niel is Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
